name: Superagent
long_description:
Superagent builds infrastructure for running and embedding AI coding agents in real workflows — safely, flexibly, and with full control.

Our latest open-source release is VibeKit, an open-source SDK for running agents like Codex or Claude inside secure, isolated environments. It supports multiple sandbox providers, adds streaming output, telemetry, and async execution — making it easy to integrate agents into apps, GitHub flows, or internal tools.

Learn more: https://www.vibekit.sh/
one_liner: Infrastructure for coding agents. Builders of VibeKit.
